title: It came to stay
creator_credit: Jack Gardiner, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
brief_description: Traces the history of the motor industry in Australia from approximately 1904 and shows the significant changes that have taken place in this field. The film shows the production of motor cars from molten metal to finished product.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Gardiner, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
description: Traces the history of the motor industry in Australia from approximately 1904 and shows the significant changes that have taken place in this field. The film shows the production of motor cars from molten metal to finished product.
